rules: Quiet hours from 10 PM to 7 AM
Remove trash and recycling before departure
security: First aid kit in the bathroom
info: Check-in time is 3 PM. Early check-in may be available upon request.
Check-out time is 11 AM. Late check-out may be arranged if available.
Free parking is available on the premises.
Local transportation info is available upon request.
Welcome pack includes local maps, guides, and a list of recommended restaurants.
The property is equipped with a local guidebook and emergency numbers.
listings.description: Experience a cozy cabin nestled in the beautiful mountains of Cluj. Enjoy breathtaking views, a relaxing hot tub, and modern amenities. Ideal for a tranquil getaway or an adventurous escape. The cabin features a fully equipped kitchen, spacious living areas, and easy access to nearby attractions.

listingDetails.checkInInstructions: Self-check-in with keypad. Instructions and code will be provided upon booking.

reviews.comment: Fantastic stay! Everything was perfect from start to finish.

I had a very pleasant stay here. The property was clean and well-maintained, and the location was ideal for exploring the surrounding area. Although there were a few minor issues, such as the Wi-Fi being a bit slow and the noise from the street at night, these did not significantly impact my overall enjoyment. I would definitely consider staying here again in the future.

My experience here was generally positive. The property had a charming decor and the staff were very friendly. However, there were a few inconveniences, such as a noisy air conditioner and limited parking space.
Great location and friendly staff. The room was clean and comfortable, though the Wi-Fi was slow.

Overall, I had a good experience, but there were several areas for improvement. The location was excellent, and the room was comfortable with a lovely view. However, the amenities fell short of expectations, particularly the outdated bathroom fixtures and occasional disturbances from neighboring rooms. Despite these issues, the host's hospitality made the stay pleasant.
I had a pleasant stay overall. The room was clean and well-maintained, but there were a few issues with the heating system and the shower was not as hot as I would have liked.
The property was lovely, with a cozy atmosphere and great amenities. However, the noise from the street was a bit disruptive at night.

The stay was average. While the location was decent and the staff was friendly, the overall experience left much to be desired. The room was not as clean as I would have liked, and the amenities were below my expectations. It served its purpose for a short stay, but I would likely look for other options in the future.

This was a great place for a weekend getaway. The host was incredibly welcoming and the room was beautifully decorated. The location was ideal for exploring the city. There were minor issues with the Wi-Fi and some noise from the hallway, but they were manageable.

Overall, my stay was very enjoyable. The property was well-maintained, and the amenities provided were satisfactory. The host was friendly and accommodating, and the location was convenient. There were a few minor issues, such as the noise from neighboring rooms, but these did not overshadow the positive aspects of the stay. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others.
